description: Show the Golden Ratio φ. Title 'The Golden Ratio φ' starts at CENTER then animates UP. Use the actual φ symbol not phi. Draw a golden rectangle using Rectangle with width=2.618 and height=1.618 in GOLD color. Show the ratio width/height = φ. Display the formula φ = (1 + √5) / 2 using actual √ symbol. Show φ = 1.618... Make all labels clear and positioned away from shapes. Final equation in ONE single Text object: 'φ = 1.618...' in large yellow centered. Use side_length for Square not side.
title: Precision in Geometry Dash
